channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1296; 05:44PM; 11865 W Rochester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46rKguT; #Sawtelle; 33 Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and extinguish fire within one third floor unit of a 6,029 square foot three-story garden style apartment building. No injuries. Though preliminary reports are that the fire originated in the kitchen, the specific cause of the fire has yet to be determined.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E19 E237 E292 E37 E59 RA59 RA837 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1296; 05:26PM; 11865 W Rochester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46rKguT; #Sawtelle; Three story garden-style apartment building with one third floor unit well involved with fire. ; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 E19 E237 E292 E37 E59 RA59 RA837 T37 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0876; 02:00PM; 1758 W 83rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QQtGPv; #ManchesterSquare; *Correction* At least *one* vehicle involved, colliding with person(s) at or near a bus stop. *Three* patients total, all in critical condition, including an adult male, an adult female, and an infant, all transported to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics. There are no further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #1877); FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E57 EM11 EM13 RA257 RA266 RA57 RA857 T66; CH4; 12; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0876; 01:32PM; 1758 W 83rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QQtGPv; #ManchesterSquare; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision with at least one pedestrian involved. Five patients total (including at least one infant). Three of the patients are in critical condition. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #1877); FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E57 EM13 RA257 RA266 RA57 RA857; CH4; 12; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out 11/23/2023 INC#0240

item.description: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0240; 04:46AM; 5708 N Cahuenga Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/39IAzNz; #NorthHollywood; 87 Firefighters took just 28 minutes (5:14 AM) to access, confine and extinguish flames and smoke seen from the roof of a one-story commercial building, determined to be a cannabis growing operation. The blaze was confined within the premises and ventilation system. No injuries reported. The cause of the fire, and legal status of the growing operation remain under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E227 E260 E278 E287 E289 E60 E76 E77 E86 E87 E89 EM14 HR3 INSP354 RA60 RA86 RA860 RA889 RA89 SO1 SQ87 T27 T60 T78 T87 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey
item.category: Greater Alarm Structure Fire - Now Out

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1684; 08:49PM; 3349 N Linda Vista Te; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uspHBj; #ElSereno; 32 Firefighters took just 17 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish an outside rubbish/debris/vegetation fire that extended into a small rear portion of an 1,110 square foot two-story descending hillside home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 E1 E16 E201 E212 E47 RA47 RA801 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1684; 08:32PM; 3349 N Linda Vista Te; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uspHBj; #ElSereno; PRELIM: Outside fire extending into the rear of a one-story home.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 E1 E16 E201 E212 E47 RA47 RA801 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1584; 07:47PM; 12301 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sMDrq0; #Sylmar; 32 Firefighters took just 16 minutes to access, confine and extinguish fire involving the rear portion of one mobile home on 'Fourth Street' in the 109 unit "Park Estates Mobile Home Park". No injury reported. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA18 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1584; 07:31PM; 12301 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sMDrq0; #Sylmar; PRELIM: One mobile home on 'Fourth Street' in the Park Estates Mobile Home Park, well involved with fire.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA18 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1705; 09:19PM; 5 Kensington Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SQuUge; Northridge; KNOCKDOWN: 42 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. One, single wide mobile home was well involved and impinged on a 2nd unit. Firefighters stopped the fire from extending into the 2nd unit and prevented the fire from damaging the other closely situated homes. No injuries reported. ; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC10 BC15 E103 E104 E107 E273 E287 E290 E73 FO1 RA107 RA70 SO1 T73 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
